#AoVivo Interview of President Dilma @PanoramicaFM. Listen here: https://t.co/N6dfWRtfA8
The Integration of the São Francisco is a very complex work. Brazil had never done such a work.
It is not the mileage of the work that is complex, but the pumping stations, tunnels, reservoirs and electric stations.
It is a complex work + of what one imagined when it was initiated. Our companies had no interconnection experience, there was a learning curve.
The critics are those who have never tried to make a work of this proportion, they are called "engineers of work done".
Why has not this work been done before? Because there was no political decision. It was a Northeasterner, Lula, who showed the political will to do so.
Now arrived? President Dilma is currently at the Radio @PanoramicaFM, in Paraíba. Listen: https://t.co/PT9DcV0fgx
I am very proud to have practically completed the most challenging parts of the San Francisco Integration work.
The gov. has attitudes of coronelismo. Freeze deposit of R $ 17.8 million that had been made to gov. to end an overpass.
In my government, we have partnered with all governments, including the opposition ones. It is inadmissible what the interim made with Paraíba.
The PM is making a statement in @HouseofCommons following yesterday's @EUCouncil. #EUCO #EUref
As we enter the last days of Ramadan, our 'Reading Nation' campaign comes to an end. Our goal was 5 million books. We achieved 8 million.
PM: We are not turning our backs on Europe and they are not turning their backs on us. #EUCO #EUref
8 million books will open doors of hope for millions of needy students and refugees, and shows we are truly a nation of readers.
PM: We will not tolerate hate crime or any kinds of attacks against people in our country because of their ethnic origin. #EUCO #EUref
Our thanks to all who contributed, participated and supported. Ramadan is the month of goodness and our UAE is a nation of giving and care.
PM: We are a proud multi-faith, multi-ethnic society - and we will stay that way. #EUCO #EUref
PM: We've shown how much we have in common with our European partners as neighbours & allies who share fundamental values, history & culture

The impeachment is foreseen in the Constitution, but with a crime of responsibility. Senate expertise says there is no crime. So it's blow.
What we see is the provisional government committing actions harmful to the people, such as the non-payment of the readjustment of the BolsaFamília.
The poor are not entitled to R $ 1.1 billion in the Bolsa Família, but those receiving more have had a readjustment of R $ 7 billion. It's an abuse.
The thing that hurts the most is injustice. The disillusionment with some of my ex-ministers was also great.
They could vote for impeachment, but they could at least have warned. They are reliable neither to me nor to others. Whoever betrays betrays others

We have approved the extension of the red line of the Dubai Metro (route 2020) with the addition of 50 new trains and a 15 km route worth AED 10 billion. Https://t.co/gdy2J4sRcZ
The new route will carry 125,000 passengers a day and will serve the largest event in the region (Expo 2020), which will host 25 million visitors.
The Dubai Metro project is an architectural pride for us .. We opened it on 9/9/2009. And became part of the nature of life in Dubai .. The transfer in 2015 alone is more than 170 million passengers
All greetings to the team of engineers, partners and consultants .. And we look forward to new additions complete the drawing of the most beautiful architectural and urban painting in the UAE
We have approved the Dhs10 billion extension of Dubai Metro's Red Line to Expo 2020: 50 new trains and 15km of track.
The new route can carry 125,000 passengers a day and serves the largest event in the region, Expo 2020, which will host 25 million visitors.
Launched on 9/9/2009, the Dubai Metro is an architectural feat and a Dubai icon which in 2015 alone transported over 170 million passengers.
